articles.author: Andrew Wright
articles.title: Rio Ferdinand on Newcastle United's European exit - 'At this level you have to punish teams' - Eurosport COM
articles.description: Rio Ferdinand said Newcastle United were made to pay for not capitalising on their first-half dominance against AC Milan in the UEFA Champions League.
articles.content:
Bruno Guimaraes of Newcastle United is dejected after the UEFA Champions League match between Newcastle United FC and AC Milan at St. James Park on December 13, 2023.
Image credit: Getty Images

articles.author: Jan Cienski, Laura Hülsemann
articles.title: Donald Tusk sworn in as Polish PM - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The seismic change in Polish election was ’caused by concern, fear, hope and dreams,’ new leader says.
articles.content: Donald Tusk was sworn in as Poland’s new prime minister on Wednesday by President Andrzej Duda and promised that his government would obey the country’s constitution a kick at the outgoing Law and Ju… [+2504 chars]
